name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPT Based - A Powerful ChatGPT Prompt Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPTBased is used to generate effective prompts for ChatGPT in a few simple steps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT prompt generation and master effective prompt engineering with our Chrome extension. Enhance your writing, brainstorming, and productivity with advanced AI capabilities right in your browser.
